title: Speedway
overview: Jo Carter is the top driver on an all-girl racing team. Ivy is the newcomer vying for Jo's spot. Will their rivalry tear their team apart?  Janine performs in a couple of terrific scenes, including a rock-video-esque chicks-on-cars tease routine that's sure to ignite your engine! Other sexual scenes in an all-girl orgy and a blistering 3-way. Very hot! It's Vivid's biggest video ever! Shot on location, on track, in the real world of championship racing. Gentlemen Start Your Penises!
